thumb.title: Zion flower / 初音ミク
thumb.description: Zion flowerA zion flower wet with morning dew sways in the wind朝露に濡れたシオンの花が風に揺れるA gentle light pours down on the hill, spreading quietly丘に優しい光が降り注ぎ、静かに広がるFlowers bloom as we reminisce, and laughter rides on the wind思い出に花を咲かせ、笑い声が風に乗るThe promise of that day is hidden in my heart, and time flows quietlyあの日の約束を胸に秘め、静かに時が流れるBlue skies, white clouds, and unchanging scenery青い空、白い雲、変わらない景色The sunset I saw with you still vividly revivesAs the seasons change bit by bit君と見た夕日が、今も鮮やかに蘇るI want to continue gazing at the things that never change, the things that are precious少しずつ移り変わる季節の中で 変わらないもの、大切なものを、見つめ続けたいOn the hill where zion flowers bloom, the two of us stand close together, gazing at each otherシオンの花が咲く丘で、二人は寄り添い見つめ合うWe swear unchanging love to each other, and walk the path that leads to the future変わらない愛を誓い合い、未来へと続く道を歩むOn the hill where zion flowers bloom, a gentle wind blowsシオンの花が咲く丘で、優しい風が吹くI sincerely hope that I want to stay here foreverずっとここにいたいと、心から願うMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : killedbysoul
